answer: The development of lossy data compression algorithms relates to previous work by utilizing the Asymptotic Equipartition Property (AEP) and building upon the work of Wyner and Ziv in 1989 (math/0103007).
explanation: This paper provides a development of parts of rate-distortion theory and pattern-matching algorithms for lossy data compression, closely paralleling the corresponding development in lossless compression.
evidence_quote: a lossy version of the Asymptotic Equipartition Property
